meanings.sent1: She dirties her clothes playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The mud dirties the floor quickly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy dirties the house with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: The rain dirties the once pristine streets.
meanings.sent5: The careless child dirties everything in sight with paint.

meanings.sent1: His hands dirties as he works in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The white shirt dirties easily when worn outside.
meanings.sent3: The snowman dirties as the sun melts it away.
meanings.sent4: The river dirties as pollution flows into it.
meanings.sent5: The clean room dirties quickly when kids come in to play.
